author: pburba
msg: Don't set override mergeinfo for skipped paths if *all* paths were skipped.
(determine_merges_performed): Don't include overrides in the merge hash if
everything is skipped.  These overrides are still ignored by
update_wc_mergeinfo(), so haven't caused any problems to date, but they
won't be ignored for much longer...

author: hwright
msg: Rev the svn_repos_get_file_revs() api to include a include_merged_revisions
parameter, and the file_rev_handler to denote whether the revision is a result

author: hwright
msg: Merge r23494 from trunk.  This fixes a crash from svndumpfilter on Windows
due to use of Microsoft-deprecated %n sprintf() format specifier to collect
